org.mini2Dx.yarn

Class YarnTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.yarn.YarnTree

  • public class YarnTree
extends java.lang.Object
    A dialogue tree built in Yarn

      • YarnTree

        public YarnTree()

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public void load(java.io.Reader reader)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Reads a .yarn.txt file add its nodes to this tree. Note that nodes are mapped by their title meaning nodes with the same title will overwrite each other.
        Parameters:
        reader - The Reader to read the file from
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if there is an error deserialising the file

      • containsNode

        public boolean containsNode(java.lang.String nodeName)
        Returns if this tree contains a specific YarnNode
        Parameters:
        nodeName - The node name to check for
        Returns:
        True if the tree contains a YarnNode with the specified name

      • clearNodes

        public void clearNodes()
        Removes all YarnNode instances from this tree

      • resume

        public void resume(YarnState state)
            throws YarnExecutionException
        Resumes the execution the of the dialogue tree
        Parameters:
        state - The current YarnState
        Throws:
        YarnExecutionException - Thrown if Yarn expressions could not be resolved

      • addListener

        public void addListener(YarnExecutionListener listener)
        Adds a YarnExecutionListener to this tree
        Parameters:
        listener - The YarnExecutionListener to add

      • removeListener

        public void removeListener(YarnExecutionListener listener)
        Removes a YarnExecutionListener from this tree
        Parameters:
        listener - The YarnExecutionListener to remove

      • clearListeners

        public void clearListeners()
        Removes all YarnExecutionListener instances from this tree
